titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Major, Aldermen, and Commons of the Citty of London to his Majesty, with his Maiesties gracious answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
